name: EchBay Phonering Alo
author: Dao Quoc Dai

sections.description: Add Phonering Alo button to your website. A very simple yet very effective plugin that adds a Call Now button to your website for every device (mobile, table and desktop).
sections.installation:
1. Upload echbay-phonering-alo folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins admin menu in WordPress
  3. Go to menu Webgiare Plugins menu and Phonering Alo menu in WordPress for custom setting.
